summary: Frontend testing completed for Phase 1 Report Builder features. All 8 requested features verified and working correctly: Report Builder page loads, Cover Page toggle enabled, Cover Page settings expand with Logo/Author/Confidentiality fields, Cover Page renders in preview, Export dropdown with 3 options, PDF export with success toast, Excel export with success toast, PNG export with success toast.

frontend: Report Builder page loads correctly at /report-builder
Cover Page section visible in settings panel
Cover Page toggle exists and can be enabled (gray -> blue)
Cover Page settings expand when enabled - Logo upload button visible
Cover Page settings expand when enabled - Author input visible and fillable
Cover Page settings expand when enabled - Confidentiality select visible with options
Cover Page renders in report preview with author name and confidentiality badge
Export dropdown button opens menu with 3 options (PDF, Excel, PNG)
Export as PDF works - shows success toast: 'Report exported successfully! (2 pages)'
Export as Excel works - shows success toast: 'Report exported as Excel successfully!'
Export as PNG works - shows success toast: 'Report exported as PNG successfully!'

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 features (Cover Page and Export options) fully verified. Cover Page toggle enables expanded settings for logo upload, author name, and confidentiality level (Public/Internal/Confidential/Strictly Confidential). Export dropdown supports PDF (with page count), Excel (xlsx), and PNG formats. All exports trigger downloads and show success toasts. Navigation: Export -> Report Builder in sidebar.
